_aChangeLog.text: Fixed a bug where textures were invisible
Added the lava texture I forgot to add the last update

_sText:
A DEATHRUN MAP THAT ALSO HAS SOME SURF IN IT! 



At long last a SURF/DEATHRUN map has been born. Atleast, one that everyone knows about. 

I made this map for my community and have bug tested it and everyone loved it so much I thought I'd upload it. 

I was also disappointed that not many good deathrun maps are being made anymore for Garrys Mod. So I made something that my community and I really enjoy. 



Basically I designed this map to originally be an underground sewage system. I noticed how deep the surf ramps I was designing were taking the player. So I decided lets start adding some lava and some cave structures and pretty soon I decided it wasnt an underground sewage system anymore. 

I have put a ton of time and effort into the map. I added some basic underground scenery areas to give the map a little sparkle, something I wish deathrun maps had more of. 





BELOW ARE THE CONTENTS 

- 10 traps 

- 60 spawns 

- 6 surf rooms 

-3 minigames (Jumprope, Survival, Bunny Hop) 


COMMUNITY SITE 

EBOLAIDSGAMING.COM 

COMMUNITY DEATHRUN SERVER IP
